com.emxsys.chart.extension

Class XYImageAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emxsys.chart.extension.XYImageAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XYAnnotation

    public class XYImageAnnotation
extends Object
implements XYAnnotation
    The XYImageAnnotation class draws image annotations on the foreground or background of an XYChart.
    Author:
    Bruce Schubert

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XYImageAnnotation(javafx.scene.image.Image image, double x, double y)
      Constructs an image annotation anchored at the image's top left corner.
      XYImageAnnotation(javafx.scene.image.Image image, double x, double y, javafx.geometry.Pos anchor)
      Constructs an image annotation anchored at the specified anchor point.
